from.info: Traded Cody Franson, Mike Santorelli to Predators for Olli Jokinen, Brendan Leipsic, 2015 first round pick on 2015-02-15

to.info: Traded rights to Jonathan Bernier to Maple Leafs for Ben Scrivens, Matt Frattin, 2014 or 2015 (Maple Leafs option) second round pick on 2013-06-23

from.info: Traded Daniel Winnik to Penguins for Zach Sill, 2015 fourth round pick, 2016 second round pick on 2015-02-25

to.info: Traded Matt Frattin to Maple Leafs for Jerry D'Amigo, 2015 conditional seventh round pick on 2014-07-01 (Conditions on pick are unconfirmed.)

from.info: Traded Daniel Winnik to Penguins for Zach Sill, 2015 fourth round pick, 2016 second round pick on 2015-02-25
Traded Korbinian Holzer to Ducks for Eric Brewer, 2016 fifth round pick on 2015-03-02

Traded Olli Jokinen to Blues for Joakim Lindstrom, 2016 conditional round pick (fourth round if Blues advance to 2015 Stanley Cup Finals and Jokinen plays a role in it, else sixth round) on 2015-03-02
